article: willie fraser hurled a two-hitter over six innings and troy neel singled home two runs as the orix bluewave blanked the yomiuri giants #-# at tokyo dome sunday , taking a lead of two games to none in the japan series .
abstract: bluewave blank giants #-# lead series two games to none
